rooms_service.database module

rooms_service.database.get_db()[source]

rooms_service.main module

Rooms Service

This module defines the FastAPI service responsible for managing rooms in the Smart Meeting Room system. It exposes endpoints to create new rooms and list all existing rooms stored in the database.

rooms_service.main.create_room(room: ~rooms_service.schemas.RoomCreate, db: ~sqlalchemy.orm.session.Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None)) → RoomResponse[source]

Create a new room in the system.

This endpoint persists a new room record in the database using the attributes provided in the request body.

Parameters:

  • room – RoomCreate schema containing the room name, capacity, and any other configured attributes.

  • db – Database session injected by FastAPI’s dependency system.

Returns:

Representation of the newly created room as stored in the database.

Return type:

RoomResponse

rooms_service.main.list_rooms(db: ~sqlalchemy.orm.session.Session = Depends(dependency=<function get_db>, use_cache=True, scope=None)) → list[RoomResponse][source]

Retrieve all rooms currently stored in the system.

Parameters:

db – Database session injected by FastAPI’s dependency system.

Returns:

A list of all rooms available in the database.

Return type:

list[RoomResponse]
